assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The ROR procedure, from registration to feedback collection, including the informed consent procedure, was approved by the ethics committee of the University of Tartu (no. 271/T-22). Informed consent was obtained from all participants as required by the REC. The biobank has been described previously [CitationRef removed] and more details about the biobank can be found at the biobank’s website ExternalRef removed.
